<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Hallowed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=3463) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 25</row>

**Archetype** [Hallowed Necromancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=172)

**Prerequisites**
[Hallowed Necromancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3459)

</column>

---

You dig deeper into the magical tools found in wizard schools and divine domains. You gain an advanced focus spell, either the [necromancer](/ArcaneSchools.aspx?ID=7) advanced school spell [_life siphon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=532) or the advanced domain spell of the [death domain](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [_eradicate undeath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=420). Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. If you choose _life siphon_, it triggers when you expend spell slots from your class even if they aren't wizard spell slots.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time, choosing the other advanced focus spell.
name: Advanced Hallowed Spell
